channel.title: Adding client to archive?
channel.description: Well, I haven't been working on servers for ages, it's funny but I forgot how to make the client into .rar so I could upload it in a rar file, well I know how but the problem is that I keep getting errors while it's being archived, I had this problem before but I fixed it and I forgot how I fixed it, anyone can help me please?

item.title: Adding client to archive?
item.dc:creator: @_Joshua `Joshua
item.description:
@_Joshua wrote:

Elrate:

Well, I haven’t been working on servers for ages, it’s funny but I forgot how to make the client into .rar so I could upload it in a rar file, well I know how but the problem is that I keep getting errors while it’s being archived, I had this problem before but I fixed it and I forgot how I fixed it, anyone can help me please?

Right click it, Compress file, select the .ZIP archive, and also make sure you use the best compress method it offers, if you get an error post it and i’ll try my best to help.

Read full topic
